title: 04/07/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 04/07/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, DP and the guys preview the Masters as the tournament begins. Two-time Masters winner Bubba Watson joined the show in the second hour to break down the course as well as explain the various atmospheres that come with the tournament. Another golfer to keep your eye on this weekend is Bryson DeChambeau. NBC Sports Golf analyst Brandel Chamblee chatted with Dan about why Bryson's a compelling golfer to watch this week. Lastly, fresh off of his national championship, Baylor head coach Scott Drew hops on the show to discuss his team’s title and what worked for his Bears against Gonzaga.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

On today’s Dan Patrick Show, DP and the guys preview the Masters as the tournament begins. Two-time Masters winner Bubba Watson joined the show in the second hour to break down the course as well as explain the various atmospheres that come with the tournament. Another golfer to keep your eye on this weekend is Bryson DeChambeau. NBC Sports Golf analyst Brandel Chamblee chatted with Dan about why Bryson's a compelling golfer to watch this week. Lastly, fresh off of his national championship, Baylor head coach Scott Drew hops on the show to discuss his team’s title and what worked for his Bears against Gonzaga.
